charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] walked into a clearing
in the forest, suddenly feeling like [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ]
was being watched.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1101_0200:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] searched around for a moment
but couldn’t find the source of the gaze.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_0300: I’m not there! Look closer, saplin’!
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_0400:
The plants here may look similar and different
at the same time. I’m sure you can tell the
differences between them, though.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1101_0500:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] looked around once
more, as the voice had instructed.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_0700: Good job, child! Yeh found my Weepinbell!
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_0800:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], yer as good as I
expected! Yeh got somethin’ other Trainers don’t!
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_0401_1000: Sorry, sorry. I didn’t mean to spook yeh.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_0402_1200: Sorry, sorry. I didn’t mean to spook yeh.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_1300: Weepinbell live in the forests and wait for prey.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_1400:
An’ that’s because both forests and Weepinbell
have their own individual quirks.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_0401_1600:
Fer example, the trees in this here spot have
thicker trunks than others.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_0402_1800:
Fer example, the trees in this here spot have
thicker trunks than others.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_1900:
That would be because each of these trees is
gettin’ plenty of sunlight.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_2000: But look at them trees over there.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_2100:
They grow thin and tall, as if reaching high for
more sunlight.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_2200:
All of us are shaped by our environment.
That’s why we develop individual quirks.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_2300:
That’s the same for the forest, Pokémon, and
people alike.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_0401_2500:
I like how modest yeh are, saplin’.
You humor an old man’s ramblin’s,
and I’m grateful for that.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_0402_2800:
I’ve been around for a while now, but I’m
always dumbstruck by interesting quirks.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_2900:
Not all quirks are handed to yeh, though, sprout.
Some of ’em yeh gotta take for yerself.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_3000:
Get out of yer comfort zone. Talk to different
people, and think new thoughts.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_3100:
Pasio’s a great place to do that.
At least, that’s what I think.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_3200:
Weepinbell might evolve soon. Or he might not.
That, too, is just one of his quirks.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_3300: I wonder which he wants to do.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_0401_3500:
To find one’s limits and become stronger, eh?
That’s certainly one way.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_0402_3700:
Acceptin’ oneself as yeh are and seekin’ stability
is one answer.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_3800: But in the end, it don’t matter much.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_3900:
What’s important is to actually think about the
answer yeh want and become the person or
Pokémon yeh can be satisfied with.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_4000:
Yeh continue making decision after decision
like that.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_4100:
And at the end of that road, yeh might see ye’ve
grown up to be a unique flower all yer own,
an’ there’s nothin’ more beautiful than that.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2311_1201_0100:
Ramos! Hi!
I just wanted to tell you that I really respect you—
from one nature-loving Gym Leader to another!
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2311_1201_0200:
The way you stand, the way you carry yourself—
you radiate the air of a true veteran, while also
emanating kindness!
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2311_1201_0300:
Heh heh heh, yer makin’ me blush, young lady.
I’m nothin’ but an old tree tryin’ its darndest to
keep bloomin’.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2311_1201_0400:
In fact, I admire the verdant youthful energy
yeh have!
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2311_1201_0500:
Well, how ’bout it? Why don’t we have ourselves
a battle?
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2311_0101_0100: Absolutely! How could I say no to that!
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2311_0101_0200: I’ll show you that this old growth is still in bloom!
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2311_0501_0100: Amazing! You really are good, aren’t you, Ramos?
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2311_0501_0200:
Ho ho! Thank yeh, child! You were battlin’ with
the power of a blossoming spring flower!
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2311_0501_0300:
I can tell how strong your friendship with your
Pokémon is.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2311_0501_0400:
Weepinbell! What’re yeh...
Are yeh about to evolve?!
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2311_0501_0500:
Well, it looks like that last Pokémon battle was
just the fertilizer yeh needed!
